ID tin: 1283881 Loại tin: Bán Đã đăng 3 ngày trước Ngày hết hạn: 22/06/2020 Bán Căn hộ chung cư Phương Đông Green Park - Đường Trần Thủ Độ, Phường Hoàng Liệt, Quận Hoàng Mai, Hà Nội .modal-content{ width: 920px; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view{ height: 480px; } .modal-content .map-street-view { margin-left: -2px; float: left; width: 100%; height: 330px; transition: 0.5s; overflow: hidden; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view .pano { height: 330px; width: 0; transition: 0.5s; position: relative; } .modal-content .map-street-view{ position:relative; /*border: 1px solid #e8e8e8;*/ } .modal-content .map-street-view .minimize { position: absolute; top: 46%; right: 0; width: 20px; height: 32px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-position: -44px -90px; background-color: #0098da; z-index: 998; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 4px -1px; cursor: pointer; border-bottom-left-radius: 2px; border-top-left-radius:2px; display: none; } .modal-content .pano .maximize { position: absolute; top: 46%; left: 0; width: 20px; height: 32px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-position: -60px -90px; background-color: #0098da; z-index: 998; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 4px -1px; cursor: pointer; /*display: none;*/ border-bottom-right-radius: 2px; border-top-right-radius: 2px; display: none; } .modal-content .map-street-view .minimize:hover, .modal-content .pano .maximize:hover { background-color: #036f9d !important; } .alert-map { position: absolute; top: 40%; left: 0; right: 0; text-align: center; padding: 8px; z-index: 999; } .alert-map span{ padding: 12px 32px; background: rgba(255, 106, 0, 0.6); color: #fff; font-size: 14px; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 4px -1px; display: inline-block; } .close-street-view{ position:absolute; top: 8px; right: 16px; font-size: 24px; cursor: pointer; } .modal-content .content-title { font-size: 16px; padding: 16px 0; padding-top: 0; line-height: normal; } .modal-content .content-title p{ font-size: 13px; margin-top: 6px; font-weight: normal; line-height: normal; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view { border-top: 1px solid #ddd; /*padding-top: 12px;*/ position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .btn-street-view { padding: 10px 18px; /*margin-top: 8px;*/ font-size: 15px; font-weight: 500; position: relative; padding-left: 35px; line-height: normal; margin-top: 4px; } .btn-street-view::after { content: " "; position: absolute; top: 8px; left: 8px; display: inline-block; width: 20px; height: 21px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-compass.png) no-repeat center; background-size: contain; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo { position: absolute; right: 0; bottom: 140px; display: inline-block; padding: 0px 12px; z-index: 997; background: #fff; line-height: 25px; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.5s; border-top-left-radius: 3px; border-top: 1px solid #e8e8e8; border-left: 1px solid #e8e8e8; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo:before { content: ""; float: left; height: 16px; width: 16px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/map/expander-sprite-1x.png) no-repeat center; background-position: 0 0; margin-top: 5px; margin-right: 3px; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo:hover{ background: #e8e8e8; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo.expand{ bottom: 0px; } .content-body-street-view .hide-list-photo.expand:before { background-position: 0 -15px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere { position: absolute; height: 128px; /*padding: 4px;*/ padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 0; background: #fff; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 997; border-top: 1px solid #e8e8e8; transition: 0.5s; /*white-space: nowrap;*/ /*overflow: auto;*/ } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-carousel { display: block; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .item { width: 230px; height: 128px; float: left; margin-right: 4px; background: #fff; cursor: pointer; border: 1px solid #fff; /*display: inline-block;*/ } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .item:hover { box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 2px 4px -2px; border: 1px solid rgba(0, 152, 218, 0.60); } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .thumb{ height: 128px; float: left; width: 244px; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/map/streetview-demo.png) no-repeat center; background-size: contain; margin-right: 16px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text { line-height: 25px; margin-left: 16px; font-size: 14px; padding-top: 32px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text img{ display: inline-block; margin-bottom: -10px; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere .guide .text span { display: inline-block; width: 8px; height: 8px; margin-left: 3px; margin-right: 3px; margin-bottom: -2px; background: rgba(84,159,184,0.5); border-radius: 6px; border: 2px solid #68aec9; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-theme .owl-nav { position: absolute; top: 30%; left: 0; right: 0; max-height: 0; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-theme .owl-nav .owl-next { position: absolute; right: -1px; width: 8px; height: 30px; display: inline-block; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-color: #f5f5f5; background-position: -77px -87px; border-radius: 0; } .content-body-street-view .list-photo-sphere.owl-theme .owl-nav .owl-prev { position: absolute; left: -1px; width: 8px; height: 30px; display: inline-block; background: url(https://static.homedy.com/src/images/icon/icon-desktop.png) no-repeat center; background-color: #f5f5f5; background-position: -29px -87px; border-radius: 0; } @media(max-width: 920px) { .modal-content { width: auto; padding: 8px 0; height: calc(100vh - 18px) !important; } .modal-content .content-body-street-view { height: calc(100vh - 53px);
